page.discussion: The A5_BATCH_DELETE_MARK() function displays the Delete/Mark/Un-mark dialog box when a form or browse is open.

section.title: Example
section.description: Note : To make this example work from the Interactive window, you must first select Interactive > Select Interactive Window Session ... > Customer Information.
section.example: dim frm as P frm = form.view("Customer Information") a5_batch_delete_mark()
